body.name: ROCKBROS Balaclava Ski Mask for Men Cold Weather Scarf Windproof Thermal Winter Women Neck Warmer Hood for Cycling Hiking
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 44 mins
features: 【 SUPERIOR COLDPROOF 】 The inner of winter ski mask is made with thicken premium polar fleece to effectively resistant the cold, and the neck is extra long, allowing you to tuck it underneath your jacket for greater warmth and protection. It can keep your face and neck warm whether you are skiing, working or commuting.

【 SOFT & COMFORTABLE 】Balaclava face mask is extremely soft, establish exquisite performance for breathability, absorbency, durability and abrasion resistance. Stretchable fabric to fit most heads, it is a nice winter gear for men and women.

【 ULTIMATE PROTECTION 】The full face cover masks outer layer is Lycra fabric , provide you ultimate protection from cold, wind, dust, UV rays and mosquito bite. Ideal as a universal protection under any type of helmet. It is also a warm headgear, especially use in the winter, protecing your head and face better from frost and winter.

【 VERSATILITY】It is a multi-fuctional winter balaclava mask, can be worn as full face mask cover, open balaclava, half ski mask, ninja hoodie, neck gaiter, neck scarf, bandana, neck warmer and winter cap.

【GOOD CHOICE IN WINTER】Our cold weather face mask applicable to most outdoor activities, like skiing, snowboarding, motorcycling, cycling, riding, ATVing, tactical training, hunting, construction, warehouse work, shoveling snow and so on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ROCKBROS Men’s Balaclava Windproof Ski Mask for Cold Weather Balaclava US Hat size:One Size Head Circumference (in):20.9 - 24 Suit for adult men or women

Soft and Comfortable Material Ski Mask's soft and comfortable material provides a cozy fit for superior warmth and protection, ensuring a pleasant and irritation-free experience in cold weather. Designed with comfort in mind, it offers soothing wear while guarding against harsh elements. High Strethhy High Stretchy feature of the product offers exceptional flexibility, allowing for a secure and adaptable fit that accommodates various head sizes comfortably. This elasticity ensures optimal mobility and comfort, making it an ideal choice for active outdoor activities.

Can the head piece be pulled down around the neck when not needed? it's flexible or stretable and can be pulled down to neck and pulled back up What are the dimensions? What is the largest size head will this fit? Headgear with good stretch for men women and teenagers Is this actually windproof? Yes, ROCKBROS balaclava can protect you from the cold. If you are in a very cold place, we suggest you to wear a helmet or thick hat Is it a one piece or does it completely separate? One piece you can pull the mouth guard up and down. Is it washer safe? We suggest hand wash in cold water with laundry detergent and line dry, this will increase balaclava's lifespan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, great fit
reviews.reviewText: This does the trick when it is cold, nice and warm and not bulky, easy fit under bike helmet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this almost everyday through this current winter and it really keeps you warm. I like how it feels on the interior, isn’t itchy. I also like how it can be fashioned in many ways. I use it as the over the head, and a scarf. Would recommend and buy more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for running in the cold!
reviews.reviewText: Read all the reviews on this mask and I made the purchase. Been using it for my night runs when it’s cold out. My face and head keeps warm and I’m not dripping with snot all over the place. It’s not to thick nor thin. Great material. 10/10🙌🏽🙌🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mask is pretty good only downside I found is the mask had 2 separate mouth pieces, would've been nice if they were sown together but that's me personally, think I'll hand sow it, besides that, pretty comfortable and keeps you warm and sun off your neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars warm and comfy
reviews.reviewText: now able to walk the dog in sub freezing weather and not turn into a popsicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Dad love sit and he is I'm construction do he is constantly outside in the elements. He has wore it everyday since he got it on Christmas. I got myself one because of the way he bragged about it. I love it , its super warm and water proof. Definitely a must have for winter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I commute on a motorcycle year round, this gives nice protectiion and warmth to my bald head under my helmet but the face mask part is way to baggy and does not stay in place. It slides down under my chin and doesnt stay up. For the price is wasnt worth returning and will be used on days that i dont need my mouth/nose covered
